Structs/TypeSafeJWT.html#/s:14Credential.name: verifier
Structs/TypeSafeJWT.html#/s:14Credential.abstract: The verifier to use when verifying tokens. This must be configured before tokens can be successfully authenticated,

Structs/TypeSafeJWT.html#/s:14Credential.name: cacheSize
Structs/TypeSafeJWT.html#/s:14Credential.abstract: The maximum size of the token cache. Defaults to 0, which is unlimited.

Structs/TypeSafeJWT.html#/s:14Credential.name: tokenTimeToLive
Structs/TypeSafeJWT.html#/s:14Credential.abstract: The length of time this token should be deemed valid before it must be verified again. Defaults to nil, which is unlimited.

Structs/CredentialsJWTOptions.html#/s:14.name: subject
Structs/CredentialsJWTOptions.html#/s:14.abstract: Determines the JWT claim that will be used for the identity of the user, (default is ‘sub’).

Structs/CredentialsJWTOptions.html#/s:14.name: userProfileDelegate
Structs/CredentialsJWTOptions.html#/s:14.abstract: An implementation of Credentials.UserProfileDelegate to update user profile.

Structs/CredentialsJWTOptions.html.name: CredentialsJWTOptions
Structs/CredentialsJWTOptions.html.abstract: A list of options for authentication with JWT.

Structs/TypeSafeJWT.html.name: TypeSafeJWT
Structs/TypeSafeJWT.html.abstract: Represents the configuration for TypeSafeJWT authenication: the verification method, and the cache parameters.

Extensions/JWT.html#/s:8SwiftJWT0B0V011C.name: id
Extensions/JWT.html#/s:8SwiftJWT0B0V011C.abstract: Note: This field does not apply to Type-safe JWT credentials. Use the JWT claims instead.

Extensions/JWT.html#/s:8SwiftJWT0B0V011C.name: authenticate(request:response:onSuccess:onFailure:onSkip:)
Extensions/JWT.html#/s:8SwiftJWT0B0V011C.abstract: Attempts to authenticate a request with an Authorization header containing a JWT.

Classes/CredentialsJWT.html#/s:14Credent.name: redirecting
Classes/CredentialsJWT.html#/s:14Credent.abstract: An indication as to whether the plugin is redirecting or not. This plugin is not redirecting.

Classes/CredentialsJWT.html#/s:14Credent.name: tokenTimeToLive
Classes/CredentialsJWT.html#/s:14Credent.abstract: The time in seconds since the user profile was generated that the access token will be considered valid

Classes/CredentialsJWT.html#/s:14Credent.name: userProfileDelegate
Classes/CredentialsJWT.html#/s:14Credent.abstract: A delegate for UserProfile manipulation. Use this to further populate the profile using

Classes/CredentialsJWT.html#/s:14Credent.name: init(verifier:options:tokenTimeToLive:)
Classes/CredentialsJWT.html#/s:14Credent.abstract: Initialize a CredentialsJWT instance. Upon first receipt, a JWT will be verified to ensure the signature is valid,

Classes/CredentialsJWT.html.name: CredentialsJWT
Classes/CredentialsJWT.html.abstract: A plugin for Kitura-Credentials supporting authentication using JSON Web Tokens.
